Reading through these comments, I see a remarkable socio-cultural clash theme emerging between the US and... the Dutch! Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is clearly an attempt to catch the wave of martial arts popularity ; It borrows many characteristics from other (beginning to hit its peak) films of similar genre and subject matter including Cobra (1986), The Protector (1985), and Lethal Weapon(1987).
